casebody.data:
In the ESTATE OF Alan Ray WAELDER, Deceased. No. ED 105770 Missouri Court of Appeals, Eastern District, NORTHERN DIVISION. Filed: June 12, 2018 James F. Lemon, 119 South 10 th Street, Hannibal, MO 63401, for appellant. Amy L. Ohnemus, 2801 St. Mary's Ave., P.O. Box 962, Hannibal, MO 63401, for respondent. Before James M. Dowd, C.J., Lawrence E. Mooney, J., and Colleen Dolan, J.

ORDER

PER CURIAM

Clayton Waelder, the only child of decedent Alan Waelder, appeals the judgment entered by the probate division of the Circuit Court of Ralls County in favor of Carolyn Waelder, Alan's wife and Clayton's stepmother, on Carolyn's motion to amend the certificate of clerk in a small estate. Finding no error, we affirm.

An opinion would have no precedential value. The parties have been provided with a memorandum, for their information only, setting forth the reasons for this decision. The trial court's judgment is affirmed. Rule 84.16(b)(1).
